info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 02 at 11:03PM CDT until June 03 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN BANDERA AND CENTRAL KERR COUNTIES... At 1102 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Kerrville-Schreiner Park, or near Kerrville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Medina, Kerrville, Ingram, Hunt, Camp Verde, Kerrville-Schreiner Park, Waltonia, Center Point and Kerr Wildlife Management Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
